programme.title: Immigrants to America and assimilation
programme.short_synopsis: Considering what happens if immigrants don't want to be assimilated into American culture.
programme.medium_synopsis: What happens if immigrants to America don't want to become Americans? Alistair Cooke considers assimilation, patriotism, Memorial Day and proposition 227.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
